name: Percy's Journey
description:
My Submission for the Metroidvania Month Game Jam. Sadly had to finish it earlier cause I have no time next week

In Percy's Journey, a action metroidvania, you accompany a little Axolotl on it's adventure. Explore a ruined Kingdom, fight ancient Warrior's and reach the center of this forgotten place

You can Play the Game with Keyboard or with a Xbox controller

The Game was made in Godot
